Cast: Zainab Balogun, Kenneth Okolie, Deyemi Okanlawon, Joke Silva, Olu Jacobs, Jide Kosoko, Rachel Oniga, Kemi Lala Akindoju, Ini Dima-Okojie, Toni Tones

Title: The Set Up
Description: Manipulation and personal vendettas collide when a con artist hires a young woman to assist with his scheme to marry a wealthy heiress.
Cast: Adesua Etomi, Jim Iyke, Dakore Akande, Marie Humbert, Ayoola Ayolola, Tina Mba, Joke Silva, Kehinde Bankole

Title: The Wedding Party
Description: As their big day arrives, a couple's lavish wedding plans turn into a nightmare of exes, fighting parents and uninvited guests.
Cast: Adesua Etomi, Banky Wellington, Richard Mofe-Damijo, Sola Sobowale, Iretiola Doyle, Alibaba Akporobome, Zainab Balogun, Beverly Naya, Enyinna Nwigwe

Title: The Wedding Party 2: Destination Dubai
Description: In this sequel to the 2016 hit "The Wedding Party," a couple's date night ends in an accidental proposal, sparking a series of chaotic family events.
Cast: Enyinna Nwigwe, Daniella Down, Banky Wellington, Adesua Etomi, Somkele Iyamah, Iretiola Doyle, Sola Sobowale, Michael De Pinna, Lynita Crofford, Patience Ozokwor

Title: This Lady Called Life
Description: Abandoned by her family, young single mother Aiye struggles to survive but stays focused on her dream of becoming an elite chef.
Cast: Bisola Aiyeola, Efa Iwara, Molawa Onajobi, Tina Mba, Wale Ojo, Jemima Osunde, Lota Chukwu, Samuel Asa'ah, Michael Ejoor, Uche Elumelu

Title: Up North
Description: A pampered heir must complete a year of service work to inherit his dad's assets but unearths new goals when he's placed in an unfamiliar region.
Cast: Banky Wellington, Rahama Sadau, Kanayo O. Kanayo, Ibrahim Suleiman, Michelle Dede, Adesua Etomi, Hilda Dokubo, Akin Lewis

Title: Voiceless
Description: A bright and promising young girl gets abducted and taken to a terrorist camp, where she unexpectedly crosses paths with her soulmate.
Cast: Uzee Usman, Yakubu Mohammed, Asabe Madaki, Sani Mu’azu, Rekiya Ibrahim Atta, Adam Garba, Abba Ali Zaky, Habiba Zock-Sock, Abdul’ Usman Zada, Nadia Dutch, Abubakar Maina, Healing Marcus Udor, Jamila Ibrahim

Title: When Love Happens
Description: Fed up with coordinating weddings for everyone else, unlucky-in-love event planner Mo turns to the internet to see if she can find her own Mr. Right.
Cast: Weruche Opia, Gideon Okeke, Beverly Naya, O.C. Ukeje, Shaffy Bello, Oreka Godis

Title: Who's the Boss
Description: A young, overworked ad executive with an overbearing boss starts her own side hustle and invents an employer once her business begins to flourish.
Cast: Funke Akindele, Blossom Chukwujekwu, Sharon Ooja, Ini Dima-Okojie, Segun Arinze, Bolly Lomo, Beverly Osu, Tayo Faniran

Title: Wives on Strike
Description: A group of local women band together to save a terrified young girl from marriage, launching a hilarious strike against their frustrated husbands.
Cast: Omoni Oboli, Kenneth Okonkwo, Kalu Ikeagwu, Uche Jumbo, Ufoma Ejenobor, Julius Agu, Udoka Oyeka, Chioma Chukwuka-Akpotha, Kehinde Bankole

Title: Wives on Strike: The Revolution
Description: After a woman is severely beaten at home, her strong-willed friends take a stand against their husbands to seek justice for domestic abuse victims.
Cast: Uche Jumbo, Omoni Oboli, Sola Sobowale, Chioma Chukwuka-Akpotha, Ufuoma McDermott, Odunlade Adekola, Kalu Ikeagwu, Kenneth Okonkwo
